PRE:
PicLan-IP/BASIC ^ ^
OPEN 'XMLDATA' TO XMLDATAF ELSE STOP 201,'XMLDATA' OPEN 'PO' TO POF ELSE STOP 201,'PO'
PL_ADD_HDR '"Content-Type: application/xml"'
PL_GETVAR PO_NUMBER FROM 'po_number' ELSE PO_NUMBER = '' PL_GETVAR PO_DATE FROM 'po_date' ELSE PO_DATE = '' PL_GETVAR BUYER_CODE FROM 'buyer_code' ELSE BUYER_CODE = '' PL_GETVAR VENDOR_CODE FROM 'vendor_code' ELSE VENDOR_CODE = '' PL_GETVAR SHIPTO_CODE FROM 'shipto_code' ELSE SHIPTO_CODE = '' PL_GETVAR PO_STATUS FROM 'po_status' ELSE PO_STATUS = ''
XML.RESPONSE = ''
IF PO_NUMBER = "" THEN XML.RESPONSE = XML.RESPONSE : 'PO Number is required' WRITE XML.RESPONSE ON XMLDATAF,'UPDATE_PO_BASIC.XML' ERR = '' CALL PLW.PAGE('/XMLDATA/UPDATE_PO_BASIC.XML','',ERR) RETURN END
READ PO.RECORD FROM POF, PO_NUMBER ELSE GOTO PO_NOT_FOUND
* Update basic fields only IF PO_DATE <> "" THEN PO.RECORD<1> = PO_DATE IF VENDOR_CODE <> "" THEN PO.RECORD<2> = VENDOR_CODE IF SHIPTO_CODE <> "" THEN PO.RECORD<4> = SHIPTO_CODE IF BUYER_CODE <> "" THEN PO.RECORD<8> = BUYER_CODE IF PO_STATUS <> "" THEN PO.RECORD<15> = PO_STATUS
WRITE PO.RECORD ON POF, PO_NUMBER
XML.RESPONSE = XML.RESPONSE : 'SUCCESS' XML.RESPONSE = XML.RESPONSE : 'PO basic fields updated successfully' XML.RESPONSE = XML.RESPONSE : '' WRITE XML.RESPONSE ON XMLDATAF,'UPDATE_PO_BASIC.XML' ERR = '' CALL PLW.PAGE('/XMLDATA/UPDATE_PO_BASIC.XML','',ERR) RETURN
PO_NOT_FOUND: XML.RESPONSE = XML.RESPONSE : 'PO not found: ' : PO_NUMBER : '' WRITE XML.RESPONSE ON XMLDATAF,'UPDATE_PO_BASIC.XML' ERR = '' CALL PLW.PAGE('/XMLDATA/UPDATE_PO_BASIC.XML','',ERR) RETURN
